title: Give me back my damn ranked!
body: 15 min after end of ranked, 1 dodge remake, 2 argument over roles, 3 dodges on team select... this blows.

replies.body: No this is just why we need Draft Normals.
This is why Normal Blind should have been deleted and replaced with Normal Dynamic like we were promised.

Last preseason.

We were promised that once Dynamic Queue was fully functional on Ranked that Normal Blind would be deleted for OCE and be replaced with Normal Dynamic.

> [the plan is for it to replace Blind Pick sometime in the future.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon?comment=00010001)
_

> [We'll keep you posted on all queue changes as they approach](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/Mc1nPqMw-new-champion-select-coming-to-ranked-soon?comment=00010001)

There was never any true promise (though the wording could have been clearer for sure), just a plan which hinged on everything else going well. With the shuffle in ranked queues and the global removal of Draft Pick it is highly unlikely this plan will go through. 

There was also never a guarantee that NCS would take the same form replacing blind pick that it does for ranked queues, in fact from the sounds of the post the blind pick experience was never going to change (as NCS for blind would just make it draft) but rather just the visual experience, which is the current experience in the LCU.

As it is it's unsure whether OCE can support two ranked queues, hence the test in preseason, nevermind a second normal queue as well.

We may eventually get something like Draft Pick without bans (or Blind Pick with role allocation) to replace blind pick in the future though.

(It's also worth noting that Dynamic Queue =/= New Champion Select, you are referring to NCS not dynamic queue which was a ranked specific thing.)

no idea why we dont have normal draft.... Its such a great way to take a normal game a tad seriously (if you intend to practice or whatever) and you can also choose your roles; which in normal you have to call and hope no one insta locks.
ranked will be back tomorrow after the pre season patch.

ta i didnt know that... had a great first ranked game back despite the loss
ps: ban graves
